home.title: More about me?
home.description:
I am a currently majoring in Computer Science with a specialization in Software Engineering. I currently work as a 🧪 Test Automation Engineer (FSWEP) at the IRCC🍁. I love to fix things and solve problems🔍.

My main focus is applying various math/cs➗ principles to develop and improve applications. I like to describe myself as a techy puzzle solver🧩 with a severe addiction for the feeling that comes from creating, fixing, and most especially completing technical puzzles😁.

More specifically, I enjoy working through programming problems and finding the best solution using wide selection of resources.✔️

about.description:
I am a software engineer and a tech enthusiast. I love to build things and solve problems. I am currently working as a software engineer at Andela. I am also a co-founder of a startup called Tribe47.
